verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We worship You, dear Lord, in the beauty of holiness, clothed in holy array. We worship You, dear Lord, in the beauty of holiness with an offering of praise. We only come to You in the raiment You gave us when on the cross You purchased and saved us. Removed our rags â€“ cleansed us and robed us in white. Hidden in You we share the beauty of holiness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We worship You, dear Lord, in the beauty of holiness set apart unto Thee. We worship You, dear Lord, in the beauty of holiness called to be holy priests. We bow before Your throne and worship Your Holiness yielding to Your Rulership over us Called and ordered by Your Authority Hidden in You we share the beauty of holiness.{/lang-eng}
